message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit lower. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $92.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $88?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $95. It's a great product and I think it's worth it. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to meet me at $94?
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $89?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $96. I think it's a great product and I'm not willing to sacrifice my profit margin. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
